channel.title: debugging on Velociraptor - Digging deeper!

item.title: How do I debug the client while it is running?
item.description: How do I debug the client while it is running? Sometimes we collect artifacts from clients but for some reason things seem to take longer than expected. Velociraptor has mechanisms to gain visibility into how clients behave and what queries are running. Query logs The first port of call is viewing the query logs in the logs tab of the relevant collection. Viewing the query logs As the query is running, it will emit a message to let us know that it is waiting for rows.
